title: Check that all safety equipment is servicable and correctly …
caption_en: Check that all safety equipment is servicable and correctly located. PE 1 EE .

title: Make sure all cabin baggage is securely stowed. J 1 EE .
caption_en: Make sure all cabin baggage is securely stowed. J 1 EE .

title: Check that all swivel seats are locked facing forward. J 1 E…
caption_en: Check that all swivel seats are locked facing forward. J 1 EE . aa o dy 4 1 I.

title: Ensure that all seat backs are upright. Cr 1 EE . aa o dy 4 …
caption_en: Ensure that all seat backs are upright. Cr 1 EE . aa o dy 4 1 I.

title: If passengers are carried, the commander shall ensure that a…
caption_en: If passengers are carried, the commander shall ensure that a safety briefing, based on the contents of the Safety Information Card, is carried out. EE 1 EE . aa o dy 4 1 I.

title: Point out the locations of the passenger oxygen mask stowage…
caption_en: Point out the locations of the passenger oxygen mask stowage compartments and show how a mask is used. Cre 1 EE .

title: Point out where the life-vests are stowed. en on 1 EE . aa o…
caption_en: Point out where the life-vests are stowed. en on 1 EE . aa o dy 4 1 I.

title: Demostrate how to put on a lifevest and the method of inflat…
caption_en: Demostrate how to put on a lifevest and the method of inflation. J 1 EE . aa o dy 4 1 I.

title: Point out the locations of the emergency exits. J 1 EE . aa …
caption_en: Point out the locations of the emergency exits. J 1 EE . aa o dy 4 1 I.

title: Brief passengers on how to open the emergency exits. ne 1 EE…
caption_en: Brief passengers on how to open the emergency exits. ne 1 EE .

title: Show passengers how to fasten and unfasten a seatbelt eae 1 …
caption_en: Show passengers how to fasten and unfasten a seatbelt eae 1 EE . aa o dy 4 1 I.

title: For all take-offs and landings, ensure that passengers are s…
caption_en: For all take-offs and landings, ensure that passengers are seated with their seatbelts fastened. ne 1 EE . aa o dy 4 1 I.

title: The carriage of infants, handicapped persons and dangerous g…
caption_en: The carriage of infants, handicapped persons and dangerous goods is normally prohibited. If required refer to the SEP manual for details of the approval authority. ae 1 EE .
